text: (a) Differentiate between an agent function and an agent program (2) (b) Differentiate between discrete and continuous environments Provide an example of each (4) (c) Consider a game in which two players take turns to remove items from a heap of tems Each player can only take from 1 to 3 items from the heap The goal of the game 1s to be the last player to take something from the heap (1 e the winner is the player that takes the last tems from the heap, and there are no more items to take once this move has been made) Suppose the game Is set up to start with 5 tems in the heap, the two players are player A and player B, and player A should move first I Define a state representation for the game @)
